segments.source_content:
---
description: Configuring your site's behavior through docusaurus.config.js and more.
---
# Configuration
import TOCInline from '@theme/TOCInline';

:::info

Check the [**`docusaurus.config.js` API reference**](api/docusaurus.config.js.mdx) for an exhaustive list of options.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::info

查看 [**`docusaurus.config.js` API 參考文件**](api/docusaurus.config.js.mdx) 以獲取完整的選項列表。

:::

segments.source_content: Docusaurus has a unique take on configurations. We encourage you to congregate information about your site into one place. We guard the fields of this file and facilitate making this data object accessible across your site.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 對於設定有獨特的見解。我們鼓勵您將網站的所有相關資訊集中到一個地方。我們會保護這個文件的欄位，並讓這個資料物件在整個網站中都能輕鬆存取。

segments.source_content: Keeping a well-maintained `docusaurus.config.js` helps you, your collaborators, and your open source contributors to be able to focus on documentation while still being able to customize the site.

translations.zh-hant: 維護良好的 `docusaurus.config.js` 可以幫助您、您的協作者以及開源貢獻者專注於文件撰寫，同時仍能自訂網站。

segments.source_content: ## Syntax to declare `docusaurus.config.js` {#syntax-to-declare-docusaurus-config}
The `docusaurus.config.js` file is run in Node.js and should export either:

translations.zh-hant: `docusaurus.config.js` 檔案在 Node.js 中執行，應該導出以下其中一項：

segments.source_content:
- a **config object**
- a **function** that creates the config object

translations.zh-hant:
- 一個 **設定物件**
- 一個 **建立設定物件的函數**

segments.source_content:
:::info

The `docusaurus.config.js` file supports:

- [**ES Modules**](https://flaviocopes.com/es-modules/)
- [**CommonJS**](https://flaviocopes.com/commonjs/)
- [**TypeScript**](./typescript-support.mdx#typing-config)

Constraints:

- **Required:** use `export default /* your config*/` (or `module.exports`) to export your Docusaurus config
- **Optional:** use `import Lib from 'lib'` (or `require('lib')`) to import Node.js packages

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::info

`docusaurus.config.js` 檔案支援：

- [**ES Modules**](https://flaviocopes.com/es-modules/)
- [**CommonJS**](https://flaviocopes.com/commonjs/)
- [**TypeScript**](./typescript-support.mdx#typing-config)

限制：

- **必填：** 使用 `export default /* 您的設定 */` (或 `module.exports`) 來導出您的 Docusaurus 設定
- **選填：** 使用 `import Lib from 'lib'` (或 `require('lib')`) 來導入 Node.js 套件

:::

segments.source_content: Docusaurus gives us the ability to declare its configuration in various **equivalent ways**, and all the following config examples lead to the exact same result:

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 讓我們能夠以多種 **等效方式** 宣告其設定，以下所有設定範例都會產生完全相同的結果：

segments.source_content: ## What goes into a `docusaurus.config.js`? {#what-goes-into-a-docusaurusconfigjs}

You should not have to write your `docusaurus.config.js` from scratch even if you are developing your site. All templates come with a `docusaurus.config.js` that includes defaults for the common options.

translations.zh-hant: 即使您在開發網站時，也不應該從頭開始編寫 `docusaurus.config.js`。所有範本都附帶一個 `docusaurus.config.js`，其中包含常見選項的預設值。

segments.source_content: However, it can be helpful if you have a high-level understanding of how the configurations are designed and implemented.

translations.zh-hant: 然而，如果您對設定如何設計和實作有高層次的理解，將會有所幫助。

segments.source_content: The high-level overview of Docusaurus configuration can be categorized into:

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 設定的高層次概述可分為以下幾類：

segments.source_content: <TOCInline toc={toc} minHeadingLevel={3} maxHeadingLevel={3} />
### Site metadata {#site-metadata}
Site metadata contains the essential global metadata such as `title`, `url`, `baseUrl`, and `favicon`.

translations.zh-hant: 網站元資料包含基本的全域元資料，例如 `title`、`url`、`baseUrl` 和 `favicon`。

segments.source_content: They are used in several places such as your site's title and headings, browser tab icon, social sharing (Facebook, X) information or even to generate the correct path to serve your static files.

translations.zh-hant: 它們在多個地方使用，例如網站的標題和標題、瀏覽器標籤圖示、社交分享（Facebook、X）資訊，甚至用於生成提供靜態檔案的正確路徑。

segments.source_content: ### Deployment configurations {#deployment-configurations}
Deployment configurations such as `projectName`, `organizationName`, and optionally `deploymentBranch` are used when you deploy your site with the `deploy` command.

translations.zh-hant: 部署設定如 `projectName`、`organizationName` 和可選的 `deploymentBranch` 在您使用 `deploy` 指令部署網站時使用。

segments.source_content: It is recommended to check the [deployment docs](deployment.mdx) for more information.

translations.zh-hant: 建議查看 [部署文件](deployment.mdx) 以獲取更多資訊。

segments.source_content: ### Theme, plugin, and preset configurations {#theme-plugin-and-preset-configurations}

List the [themes](./using-plugins.mdx#using-themes), [plugins](./using-plugins.mdx), and [presets](./using-plugins.mdx#using-presets) for your site in the `themes`, `plugins`, and `presets` fields, respectively. These are typically npm packages:

translations.zh-hant: 在 `themes`、`plugins` 和 `presets` 欄位中分別列出您網站的[主題](./using-plugins.mdx#using-themes)、[插件](./using-plugins.mdx)和[預設集](./using-plugins.mdx#using-presets)。這些通常是 npm 套件：

segments.source_content: They can also be loaded from local directories:

translations.zh-hant: 也可以從本地目錄載入：

segments.source_content: To specify options for a plugin or theme, replace the name of the plugin or theme in the config file with an array containing the name and an options object:

translations.zh-hant: 若要為插件或主題指定選項，請在配置文件中將插件或主題的名稱替換為包含名稱和選項物件的陣列：

segments.source_content: To specify options for a plugin or theme that is bundled in a preset, pass the options through the `presets` field. In this example, `docs` refers to `@docusaurus/plugin-content-docs` and `theme` refers to `@docusaurus/theme-classic`.

translations.zh-hant: 若要為預設集中捆綁的插件或主題指定選項，請通過 `presets` 欄位傳遞選項。在此範例中，`docs` 指 `@docusaurus/plugin-content-docs`，`theme` 指 `@docusaurus/theme-classic`。

segments.source_content:
:::tip

The `presets: [['classic', {...}]]` shorthand works as well.

:::
For further help configuring themes, plugins, and presets, see [Using Plugins](./using-plugins.mdx).

translations.zh-hant: 如需進一步配置主題、插件和預設集的幫助，請參閱[使用插件](./using-plugins.mdx)。

segments.source_content: ### Custom configurations {#custom-configurations}
Docusaurus guards `docusaurus.config.js` from unknown fields. To add custom fields, define them in `customFields`.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 會防止 `docusaurus.config.js` 出現未知欄位。若要添加自訂欄位，請在 `customFields` 中定義它們。

segments.source_content: Example:
## Accessing configuration from components {#accessing-configuration-from-components}
Your configuration object will be made available to all the components of your site. And you may access them via React context as `siteConfig`.

translations.zh-hant: 您的配置物件將可供網站的所有組件使用。您可以通過 React 上下文以 `siteConfig` 的形式存取它們。

segments.source_content: Basic example:

:::tip

If you just want to use those fields on the client side, you could create your own JS files and import them as ES6 modules, there is no need to put them in `docusaurus.config.js`.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

如果您只想在客戶端使用這些欄位，可以創建自己的 JS 文件並將其作為 ES6 模組導入，無需將它們放在 `docusaurus.config.js` 中。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Customizing Babel Configuration {#customizing-babel-configuration}
Docusaurus transpiles your site's source code using Babel by default. If you want to customize the Babel configuration, you can do so by creating a `babel.config.js` file in your project root.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 預設使用 Babel 轉譯網站的原始碼。若要自訂 Babel 配置，可以在專案根目錄中創建 `babel.config.js` 文件。

segments.source_content: To use the built-in preset as a base configuration, install the following package and use it

translations.zh-hant: 若要使用內建預設集作為基礎配置，請安裝以下套件並使用它：

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm install --save @docusaurus/babel
```
Then use the preset in your `babel.config.js` file:

translations.zh-hant: 然後在 `babel.config.js` 文件中使用該預設集：

segments.source_content: Most of the time, the default preset configuration will work just fine. If you want to customize your Babel configuration (e.g. to add support for Flow), you can directly edit this file. For your changes to take effect, you need to restart the Docusaurus dev server.

translations.zh-hant: 大多數情況下，預設的預設集配置都能正常運作。若要自訂 Babel 配置（例如添加對 Flow 的支援），可以直接編輯此文件。要使變更生效，需要重新啟動 Docusaurus 開發伺服器。
